data.title: The life and death of Anna Nicole Smith
data.meta_description: Anna Nicole Smith met a billionaire while working as a stripper in Texas. The fateful meeting was the catalyst for many surreal and tragic events. | Business Insider Africa
data.text:
Source: Netflix Business Insider USA

According to the new Netflix documentary "Anna Nicole Smith: You Don't Know Me," she met her first husband, Billy Wayne Smith, while he was working as a cook in the restaurant. They married in 1985 when Smith was 17 years old. Business Insider USA

Source: Netflix Business Insider USA

In "You Don't Know Me," Smith's friend and former lover Missy Byrum claimed that Smith's addiction to pain pills started after her breast augmentation surgery, which she saved up for as part of her quest to become a famous model. Business Insider USA

Source: Netflix Business Insider USA

Source: Netflix Business Insider USA

Source: Netflix Business Insider USA

During this time, Smith refused Marshall's proposals of marriage several times, according to Byrum.Byrum said in "You Don't Know Me" that Smith told Marshall she didn't want to marry him before making a name for herself, for fear of being called a "gold digger." Business Insider USA

When they married, Smith was 26 and Marshall was 89.Smith was also in high demand at that point in her career, coming off of the Guess deal, and landed her first acting jobs. She appeared as Za-Za in the Coen brothers' movie "The Hudsucker Proxy" and as Tanya in "Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult," both released in 1994. Business Insider USA

Marshall's son E. Pierce Marshall had begun the legal process of cutting Smith off from spousal support when his father got sick, according to the documentary, and the matter wasn't resolved at the time of Marshall's death. When he died, Smith was not mentioned in his will. Business Insider USA

The Supreme Court ruled that Smith could continue to pursue her claim to part of Marshall's oil fortune in May 2006, according to NPR. Business Insider USA

According to CBS News, Smith was hospitalized for an adverse reaction to drugs in 1995 and filed for bankruptcy in 1996. In the late '90s she continued working, appearing in Third Eye Blind's music video for "Jumper" and in an episode of the hit legal drama "Ally McBeal" in 1999. Business Insider USA

"The Anna Nicole Show" premiered on E! in August 2002, at the apex of the celebrity reality TV craze. Business Insider USA

Source: CNN Business Insider USA

"Like my body?" the model asked, before slurring her words in a speech introducing Ye, the rapper formerly known as Kanye West. Business Insider USA

In June 2006, Smith announced she was pregnant via her website but she didn't mention the name of the child's father. She gave birth to her daughter, who she named Dannielynn, on September 7, 2006 in the Bahamas.At the time of Dannielynn's birth, Smith's lawyer Howard K. Stern was listed as the baby's father on the birth certificate. He maintained his paternity claim in subsequent interviews. Business Insider USA

Three days after Dannielynn's birth, while visiting his mother and newborn sister in the Bahamas, Smith's son Daniel died suddenly at the age of 20."Anna Nicole is absolutely devastated by the loss of her son. He was her pride and joy and an amazing human being. Please do not make any press inquiries at this time so that Anna Nicole can grieve in peace," Smith said in a statement posted to her website at the time, per People.His cause of death was later determined to be an accidental drug overdose, according to Reuters. Business Insider USA

Months after Daniel's death, Smith was rushed to the hospital after collapsing in a Florida hotel room. The TV personality died on February 8, 2007; she was 39 years old. Her cause of death was later determined to be an accidental drug overdose. Business Insider USA

After Smith's death, her former lawyer Stern and photographer Larry Birkhead, who said that he and Smith had formerly had a sexual relationship, were still arguing over Dannielynn's paternity.In April 2010, Birkhead announced that a DNA test confirmed that he was the baby's father. Business Insider USA

According to Inside Edition, Smith's lawyers lost their last legal move to get money from the late oil tycoon's estate in 2014, seven years after Smith's death. In a 2017 interview with Inside Edition, Dannielynn's father Larry Birkhead commented on trying to shield his daughter from reports about the legal battle â€” and misinformation about her wealth."We saw a video on YouTube that she was one of the ten richest kids in America," the photographer said. "Then she wanted to go to the mall. And I'm like, 'No, it's not that. Trust me, it's not that.'"Dannielynn turned 16 in September 2022."Anna Nicole Smith: You Don't Know Me" is streaming now on Netflix. Business Insider USA
